extendedInfo.description: Use your Android tablet or phone to stream videos & music from your favorites websites to your big screen TV - wirelessly.* PLEASE PURCHASE THIS PRODUCT ONLY AFTER TRYING OUT OUR FREE VERSION TO MAKE SURE YOUR DEVICES ARE SUPPORTED *If you're having any trouble or device detection issues, questions, feature or channel requests PLEASE CONTACT US BEFORE RATING, so we can help you out and improve the App - your feedback really does help. We cannot respond to comments here.Website: http://www.playto.tv Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/playtotv?ref=hlTwitter: https://twitter.com/#!/playtotv with #playtotvPlayTo was selected by TheGuardian in the 20 Best Android appshttp://www.guardian.co.uk/technology/appsblog/2012/aug/31/best-android-apps-paralympics-skydrive?newsfeed=truePlayTo for Android provides an ever growing and up to date list of online videos, TV shows, movies and radio - once you find what you like, it lets you stream them to your big screen TV, with Airplay like functionality. All you need is an internet enabled TV or a media player - no additional cables, adapters or hardware required. Also bookmark videos from 100+ video sites and play them as a playlist on your TV.Our built in media browser has customized support for various websites and plays all videos full screen and in HD (when available).- Play your favorite videos from Youtube, Vimeo, Dailymotion, Blip on your big screen TV.- Create your own video playlists with videos from Vevo, Muzu, VH1, MTV, etc.- Listen to music all day on your audio receiver or wireless speakers using own built-in integration for TuneIn, Amazon Cloud Player- Catch up to on demand TV shows with our integration for Bravo, Koldcast, Disney, TCM, TMZ, History, TBS, Syfy, Univision, NBC, etc.- Experience social media from Pinterest, Socialcam, Viddy on your smart TV.- Enjoy free Bollywood dramas and shows from Video Chaska, iStream- Our south Asian audience can enjoy their favorite videos from LeTV, Youku, 56.com, Pandora TV, Yupp TV, India Today, TOI, IBN, etc.- We have expanded our European channel support with sites like Sky News, Rutube, The Guardian, DW, NRK, SVT, ZDF, etc.- Sport aficionados can catch up to the latest events with our integration to sites like NFL, ESPN, Sky Sports- Tech enthusiasts can check the latest videos on gadgets from sites like Engadget, Revision3, Wired, CNet on their favorite gadgets- Also catch up to the latest events with our support for many News channels like NBC, CNN, Reuters, New York Times, Wall Street Journal, BBC, Fox & ABC If you have a big collection of personal media, movies, pictures or music - PlayTo also seamlessly discovers computers or other network devices supporting UPnP, DLNA containing your personal videos, photos and music and play them on your tablet/smartphone or stream them to your TV - supports media servers like TVersity, Plex Media Server, Serviio, XBMC, Twonky, WMP, PS3 Media Server, Iomega, etc.Note:1. Your TV/Media Player/BluRay player needs to be DLNA enabled and needs to be on the same Wifi network as your phone/tablet for PlayTo to discover and stream2. To access Phone/Tablet media, makes sure your it is not plugged into to the computer as Android will prevent PlayTo from accessing the media.3. Flash streaming is NOT supported as most media player and TV's do not support Flash

reviews.comment: One star. Only 5 free streams.The idea is great . Id love to use my samsung tablet to stream movies to my samsung tv or music to my samsung surround sound. Even stream movies from my cpu to my tv. 5 stars if this everfixed
reviews.author: Jonah Mcleish

reviews.title: Good
reviews.comment: It works pretty well when my tv is connected via UTP cable to my home network. But when the tv is connected via wifi dongle the app doesn\'t find the tv. I tried zappotv app and it found the tv while on the wifi dongle. If you get this issue sorted I will more than happy to buy the pro version. Also it would be nice to allow the user to input tge tv IP manually if it is not detected automatically. Regards
reviews.author: Florian Lazar

reviews.title: Great app
reviews.comment: Can\'t forward content or move to certain part of film, plays on tablet but won\'t sync on TV. So if I wanted to fast forward through device the film will just restart and on the device will show film where I want it.  would of given 5 star  if  I could have more functionality. Thanks for a great app though.
reviews.author: Buster Jones

reviews.title: Perfect!
reviews.comment: This app is a must have for any Samsung smart TV owner, you can stream anything to your TV instantly, its so fast and so simple to use, it really improves and utilises smart TVs
reviews.author: Ross Collins

reviews.title: Great app! !
reviews.comment: This app isn\'t prefect,  but it is much better for playing YouTube to my tv than the Samsung system of pairing.  It works perfectly with my plex server on my pc. But the YouTube integration is a bit clunky.
reviews.author: Matthew Humphreys

reviews.title: I really like this app,  BUT
reviews.comment: I really like this app but it doesn\'t support flash and a lot of videos require it.  Even the channels that come with the app.  I will Uninstalled until flash is supported and then purchase the pro app.
reviews.author: nigel langton

reviews.title: App does not work as advertized
reviews.comment: Can\'t get the app to recognize my TV (a brand new Samsung LED), and the instructions for how to do so are poorly written and not helpful at all. Don\'t waste your time.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Junk
reviews.comment: I\'m not quite sure where our what it was trying to play to, but this doesn\'t work.
reviews.author: Wayne Deleersnyder

reviews.title: Works On My Samsung UN60D7000 Smart TV With Note 2
reviews.comment: This app works for me. I am using a Samsung Smart TV Model UN60D7000. The smart phone I am using to send media to the TV is a Samsung Galaxy Note 2. Communication between my phone and the TV is with  a wireless network (wifi) using a D-Link Access Point Model DAP-1525.  I have been able to play video, music, or pictures stored on my phone onto my TV.  It won\'t show every stored picture.  The ones I noticed it would not show were those I had cropped out with the S-Pen and saved.  The images created with the built-in camera did show fine though. As for video it did show those captured with the built-in camera and a .wmv file I copied to my phone from a Pc.  This is awesome to show guests or just to enjoy the enhanced sound and display.  Sounds great with the optical cable coming out of my TV and into my stereo receiver with Bose speakers.   If this tool could just support showing the pictures I saved using the S-Pen I will then give it 5 stars. Otherwise it is still very good for me.
reviews.author: Robert Marquez

reviews.title: Don\'t waste ur time
reviews.comment: Gotta love an app that u download only to find u get a very small sample then they want u to upgrade at a ridiculous price to be able to get any use out of it. When are these developers going to learn to stop wasting ppls time..they need to tell us up front and not in the fine print..don\'t waste ur time with crap like this.besides it streamed video very poor over a lightening fast router..junk!!!
reviews.author: Matthew Roesel

reviews.title: Not even a good app.
reviews.comment: Tried 10 tv channels and none of them would load.
reviews.author: Dan Mangold

reviews.title: Great idea
reviews.comment: And seems to work but with only three streams tried and two failing it then said I had to upgrade if I wanted more. So on balance no proof that it works. Shame, because it looked promising. Would love to stream from my NAS but it didn\'t seem to find any file shares outside of my phone.
reviews.author: George Freemantel

reviews.title: Good
reviews.comment: Good
reviews.author: maninder sra

reviews.title: Perfect..
reviews.comment: It does what it says it does and it does it well. I\'d like to give this app 6 stars.
reviews.author: Erik Walsh

reviews.title: Waste of time
reviews.comment: Does not work Full with ads.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: No good
reviews.comment: It doesn\'t play the nbc or cw.It doesn\'t even play CBS which plays on my phone anyway.Will uninstall this app.No point in paying.Note to developers.Offer full features on the free for one day,then charge.This app must do what the android couldn\'t do before.
reviews.author: Tamsin Mavric

reviews.comment: Installed and did not work with the Roku box. Customer service non-existent. Uninstalled
reviews.author: Jeronimo Rutzen

reviews.title: Jj
reviews.comment: Rubbish trash they are idiots I hate this
reviews.author: Jerome Francis

reviews.title: Super app
reviews.comment: Enjoying playing online videos on tv..

reviews.title: Kool
reviews.comment: This would have been a great app but the only wack thing about it is you have to use wifi to watch it
